description.value: Defines the additional constraints and extensions on the UK Core Observation profile, for recording if a patient is breathing room air, or inspired oxygen.

purpose.value:
To provide implementers with additional support when implementing recording of whether a patient is breathing on their own, or is on oxygen.
The clinical observations within scope of this profile include all patient respiration: Unaided, Oxygen Concentrators, Nasal Cannula, CPAP Devices, Endotracheal Tube, and Mechanical Ventilator.
